alert.note: Alert for City of Chesapeake; City of Suffolk (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 07 at 6:21PM EDT until April 07 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CAMDEN...PASQUOTANK...PERQUIMANS...NORTHEASTERN BERTIE...EASTERN HERTFORD...GATES...NORTHWESTERN CURRITUCK...AND NORTHWESTERN CHOWAN COUNTIES...THE SOUTHERN CITY OF CHESAPEAKE AND THE SOUTHERN CITY OF SUFFOLK... At 619 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Suffolk to 6 miles southwest of Colerain, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. These severe storms will be near... Tyner around 635 PM EDT. Chesapeake around 640 PM EDT. Belvidere around 645 PM EDT. Hertford and Winfall around 650 PM EDT. Chapanoke around 655 PM EDT. Elizabeth City and Nixonton around 705 PM EDT. Elizabeth City State University around 710 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Goose Pond, Whites Crossroads, Tunis, Pierceville, Newsome Store, Savage, Arrowhead Beach, Chowan Beach, Topsy and Parkville. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for northeastern North Carolina...and southeastern Virginia. A tornado warning is in effect until 645 pm for parts of Bertie, Hertford, Gates and Chowan Counties in North Carolina. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: City of Chesapeake; City of Suffolk
